topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55778ca9636872785b000276#post_55778ca9636872785b000276
i just feel like i got more than a bar-

no fuck that, i've gotten *_WAY_* more than i bargained for with this show, and it's continued decadence is brought on by the vocal majority that i started disliking back in late 2011

there was an explosion of these people in 2012 and i hoped to god that they'd disappear (as it seems more like an ostentatious fad than a genuine interest with the people i'm talking about) however due to the show's continued fanservice that will never happen

i mean i just wanted to watch a kids show ffs, it was cool that other people liked it at first but watching others discover the show and its fanmade curisities time and time again gets old fast

its not so much drama as it is my personal opinion on the matter. besides everyone else i knew from back then, the apathetic ones i brought up, were sane enough to have stopped caring about the show years ago. i just have trouble with letting the past stay where it is, yknow?

topics.body:
This probably will devolve into a argument, but I read something *REALLY* interesting.  Like legitimately interesting.


You know how politicians constantly spout "women earn less than men"?
I was elsewhere on the net and someone made a interesting point "if women earn less than men wouldn't that cause companies to hire them more than men?"

I'll summarize since I have to take a exam in two hours and I need to get some last minute cramming in.
Short version is that the pay gap is miniscule at higher paying jobs; the reason for the pay gap is that women get hired much more than men at low income jobs.  If you have ever worked at a shitty walmart that fucks over employees you know what I mean.

When it comes to low paying jobs companies prefer first undocumented workers at the top of the hiring pole then women then men.

"Well how do we close the income gap?"

That's where changes in the workforce come in.  By 2025 70% of minimum wage or lower jobs will be eliminated.  There will still be need for plenty of workers; it's just jobs like janitors or such will be eliminated entirely.  The reason why this helps both undocumented workers and women is that since those minimum wage jobs will be eliminated they will be hired instead for higher paying jobs.

If any politician in the next ten years says, "I'm responsible for the higher quality of living for undocumented workers/women" they are utterly 100% full of bullshit.

In 10 years time the cost of living will be significantly down due to inventions like 3d printing houses, 3d printred vehicles, 3d printed organs, reprogramming cells, etc.


Tl:dr; over the course of the next ten years the majority of low paying jobs will be eliminated and the cost of living will go drastically down and *ANY* politician that says they're responsible is full of shit.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557793a1636872514d00106c#post_557793a1636872514d00106c
That argument is actually pretty old. It's from libertarian circles. 
If you can pay people less for the same output, you will hire more of those people. Conversely if there are any non-wage costs to hiring more of a certain group, you will cut their wages to balance it out.
